params.name: input_ids_query
params.description: Indices of input sequence tokens in the vocabulary for the queries in a batch.Indices can be obtained using AutoTokenizer. See PreTrainedTokenizer.encode() andPreTrainedTokenizer.call() for details.What are input IDs?

params.name: attention_mask_query
params.description: Mask to avoid performing attention on padding token indices. Mask values selected in [0, 1]:1 for tokens that are not masked,0 for tokens that are masked.What are attention masks?

params.name: input_ids_doc
params.description: Indices of input sequence tokens in the vocabulary for the documents in a batch.

params.name: attention_mask_doc
params.description: Mask to avoid performing attention on documents padding token indices.

params.name: checkpoint_batch_size
params.description: If greater than 0, uses gradient checkpointing to only compute sequence representation oncheckpoint_batch_size examples at a time on the GPU. All query representations are still compared toall document representations in the batch.
